issue.title: [CF 693] Icon Tooltip and little more
issue.body:
Just some thoughts on how to enhance this addon as I'm looking forward to use it as a future replacement for Raven/Aura Frames/Satrina Buff Frames.

Buff/debuff icon type:
1. Show tooltip - Yes/No
2. Show spell tooltip (only when buff/debuff is missing) - Yes/No (active only when first option is set to "yes")
3. Show in combat - Yes/No (active only when first option is set to "yes")
4. Right click to cancel - Yes/No (of course it works out of combat only)

Any spell (item or spell cooldowns, multistate, reactive abilities etc.) icon type:
1. Show tooltip - Yes/No
2. Show when absent (e.g. Healthstone may not be present in bags, some talent might not be chosen) - Yes/No (active only when first option is set to "yes")
3. Show in combat - Yes/No (active only when first option is set to "yes")

Hope you like these ideas! Thanks for your work!


> Posted by CurseForge user CuteBunny | Imported from CurseForge issue #693 | Raw

comments.body:
TellMeWhen is intended to provide quick, at-a-glance information about combat. I can't see how displaying tooltips, or having click interactivity with gameplay mechanics while out of combat, would help to enhance this objective.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Tooltips and cancel would help consolidate addons.


> Posted by CurseForge user ElectricMenace
